title.value: The features of the Display Suite module

body.value:
The Display Suite module in Drupal offers a range of functionalities that can enhance the display and layout of your content. 

Here are some common use cases for the Display Suite module:

  1. Customizing Content Layout: Display Suite allows you to create custom layouts for your content types. You can define regions on the page and arrange fields, blocks, or other elements within those regions. This gives you the flexibility to design unique and visually appealing layouts for your content.
  2. Controlling Field Display: With Display Suite, you have precise control over how individual fields are displayed. You can modify field labels, adjust formatting options, and add wrappers to style fields as needed. This enables you to create consistent and visually pleasing displays for your content.
  3. Creating Custom View Modes: Display Suite lets you create custom view modes for your entities. View modes determine how content is presented in different contexts, such as teaser, full content, or custom modes. This feature allows you to tailor the display of your content to specific needs and use cases.
  4. Field Injection: Display Suite enables you to inject fields from related entities into the display of the current entity. For example, you can include the author's profile picture and name on a node page without requiring additional modules or complex configurations. This simplifies the process of displaying related data.
  5. Responsive Design: The Display Suite module offers built-in support for creating responsive designs. You can define different layouts and display options for various screen sizes or devices. This ensures that your content looks great and functions well across different platforms.
  6. Templating and Theming: Display Suite allows you to create custom templates for individual fields or groups of fields. This gives you fine-grained control over the HTML markup and styling of specific elements, allowing for highly customized and branded displays.
  7. Integration with Other Modules: Display Suite integrates well with other popular Drupal modules such as Views, Panels, and Context. This provides you with the ability to combine its features with other powerful tools to create advanced display configurations and layouts.
